categories: Category:Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game Aces

nodes.text: The Imperial Aces Expansion Pack is a supplement to the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game from Fantasy Flight Games. The expansion features two detailed TIE/IN interceptor miniatures. It was released on March 17, 2014 as part of the game's Aces wave of expansions.
The Imperial Aces Expansion Pack contains two miniatures, plus a maneuver dials and action tokens, as well as pilot and upgrade cards.
